name: Tiny Bubble Blaster
description:
Made in 3 days for GB Jam 7

--------------------------------------------------

Inspired by Pang/Buster Bros, Tiny Bubble Blaster is a small game about popping bubbles. What makes it different from those games? You can walk on the walls!

There are 10 different levels to go through, and with them 10 lives for you to spend dying over and over again!

--------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

Z - Shoot

Left/Right Arrow keys - Move

--------------------------------------------------

Code/Design/Audio/Graphics by Zushi3DHero

Font used: Link
